name: The Demon of Words
description:
This is a bullet-hell word game about a Mouse Cursor saving the Internet. You will have to make a word from letters you picked up and use that to deal damage to your enemy while also dodging their attacks.
To save the game in Campaign Mode, you need to go to the settings, copy the level's code and save it locally on your computer (Maybe save it to a .txt file). Later on, if you want to continue the game, press the "Load" button and paste that code in.
The green flag will RESET your game, it's NOT a go to menu button. Use it only after you won your current game or you saved the level's code.  The resume/play button is self-explanatory. The red stop button will just stop the game and you will have to reset it using the green flag.
